Message:
My body transformed
into that of a witch.

Witches are evil monsters
that devastate the world—

the source of plagues, disasters...
Every kind of misfortune.

Their very existence
causes people to suffer...

No, this is surely
another one of God’s trials.

He would never put anyone
through a trial they cannot
overcome.

O Lord, I shall overcome
this trial you have presented
before me.

So I beg you...
show me the way.

a Letter of Summons
came from Her Holiness.
It was like a sign
from God Himself.

Information about my condition
was written in the letter,

as well the existence of
a method to heal it.

Thank goodness.
My prayers have been answered...
O Lord, I am eternally grateful.
In order to face this next trial,

I set forth towards
the heart of the Holy See,
where Her Holiness awaited.
